title: Mental Chats | StreetSmart
description: In this video, Max Fosh engages in 'Mental Chats' with strangers on the streets of London, pretending to have conversations with them telepathically.
summary: Max Fosh pretends to have telepathic conversations with strangers on the streets of London.
payoff: The humor comes from the reactions of the unsuspecting strangers as Max pretends to communicate with them without speaking.
